typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Validation_Flag as double,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as string,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as string,
		Reporting_Period as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testoutputfromParquet.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Certification_Type,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
